Memorial Day (No School, District Offices Closed)
c

strong.span: If this is an emergency, dial 911.

span.span:
While SACS is committed to responding quickly to information received via the Tip Lines, the lines are not monitored 24/7 and may not be monitored when school is not in session. If this an emergency, or if you or someone you know needs immediate assistance, please call 911.
To report a concern about students, staff and/or school property you may use:
Quick Tip -

a.title: Link to Quick Tip online notification

em.a: an online reporting tool that allows students, parents, staff and community members to submit information to district administrators anonymously or not.
